TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit FromBase64Transform extends System.Object implements class System.IDisposable, class System.Security.Cryptography.ICryptoTransform
type FromBase64Transform = class interface ICryptoTransform interface IDisposable

span.span: Converts a from base 64.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Base 64 內容轉移編碼代表任意的位元序列的形式為人類無法讀取。Base 64 Content-Transfer-Encoding represents arbitrary bit sequences in a form that is not human readable. ## Examples 下列範例將解碼到輸出文字檔的基底 64 編碼檔案。The following example decodes a base 64-encoded file to an output text file. [!code-cpp[System.Security.Cryptography.FromBase64Transform Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Cryptography.FromBase64Transform Example/CPP/class1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Security.Cryptography.FromBase64Transform Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Cryptography.FromBase64Transform Example/CS/class1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Security.Cryptography.FromBase64Transform Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Cryptography.FromBase64Transform Example/VB/class1.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方式的簡單呼叫。This method is a simple call to . 呼叫`Dispose`可讓所使用的資源重新配置用於其他用途。Calling `Dispose` allows the resources used by the to be reallocated for other purposes. 如需詳細資訊`Dispose`，請參閱 < [ 清除 Unmanaged 資源總](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)。For more information about `Dispose`, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md).

abstract member Dispose : unit -> unit override this.Dispose : unit -> unit

summary.span: 釋放 類別目前的執行個體所使用的全部資源。

span.span: Releases all resources used by the current instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `Dispose` 使用完畢時，請呼叫 。Call `Dispose` when you are finished using the . `Dispose` 方法會將 保留在無法使用的狀態。The `Dispose` method leaves the in an unusable state. 之後呼叫`Dispose`，您必須釋放所有的參考讓記憶體回收行程可以回收記憶體，所佔用。After calling `Dispose`, you must release all references to the so the garbage collector can reclaim the memory that the was occupying. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 清除 Unmanaged 資源向上](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)並[實作 Dispose 方法](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)。For more information, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) and [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md). > [!NOTE] > 在您釋放最後一個 `Dispose` 參考之前，請務必呼叫 。Always call `Dispose` before you release your last reference to the . 否則工作窗格所使用的資源不會釋放，直到記憶體回收行程呼叫 物件的 `Finalize` 方法。Otherwise, the resources it is using will not be freed until the garbage collector calls the object's `Finalize` method.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void Dispose(bool disposing) cil managed
Protected Overridable Sub Dispose (disposing As Boolean)
abstract member Dispose : bool -> unit override this.Dispose : bool -> unit

param.name: disposing
param.span: 表示會同時釋放 Managed 和 Unmanaged 資源， 則表示只釋放 Unmanaged 資源。

span.span: to release both managed and unmanaged resources; to release only unmanaged resources.

summary.span: 釋放 所使用的 Unmanaged 資源，並選擇性地釋放 Managed 資源。

span.span: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the and optionally releases the managed resources.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會呼叫公用`Dispose()`方法和`Finalize`方法。This method is called by the public `Dispose()` method and the `Finalize` method. `Dispose()` 叫用受保護`Dispose(Boolean)`disposing 參數設定為方法`true`。`Dispose()` invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with the disposing parameter set to `true`. `Finalize` 會透過將處置設定為 `Dispose` 而叫用 `false`。`Finalize` invokes `Dispose` with disposing set to `false`. `disposing` 參數為 `true` 時，這個方法會釋放 參考的任何 Managed 物件所掌握的資源。When the `disposing` parameter is `true`, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this references. 這個方法會叫用每個參考物件的 `Dispose()` 方法。This method invokes the `Dispose()` method of each referenced object.

para.span: 可以被其他物件呼叫多次。

span.span: can be called multiple times by other objects.

para.span: 當覆寫，請小心不要參考先前處置呼叫中的物件。

span.span: When overriding , be careful not to reference objects that have been previously disposed in an earlier call to .

para.span: 如需有關如何實作，請參閱 <<c2> [ 實作 Dispose 方法](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)。

span.span: For more information about how to implement , see [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md).

para.span: 如需詳細資訊並，請參閱[清除 Unmanaged 資源總](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)。

span.span: For more information about and , see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md).

MemberSignature.Value: .method hidebysig newslot virtual instance void System.IDisposable.Dispose() cil managed

summary.span: 釋放 所使用的 Unmanaged 資源，並選擇性地釋放 Managed 資源。

span.span: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the and optionally releases the managed resources.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 呼叫這個方法是公用的 dispose （） 方法和 Finalize 方法。This method is called by the public Dispose() method and the Finalize method. Dispose （） 叫用受保護的 dispose （boolean） 方法處置參數設定為 true。Dispose() invokes the protected Dispose(Boolean) method with the disposing parameter set to true. 完成程序叫用 Dispose，並將處置設定為 false。Finalize invokes Dispose with disposing set to false. 處置參數，則為 true 時，這個方法會釋放任何 managed 物件所持有的所有資源這個參考。When the disposing parameter is true, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this references. 這個方法會叫用每個參考物件的 dispose （） 方法。This method invokes the Dispose() method of each referenced object. **繼承者注意事項︰****Notes to Inheritors:** 可以多次呼叫 dispose 的其他物件。Dispose can be called multiple times by other objects. 在覆寫 dispose （boolean），小心不要參考先前處置對 Dispose 的早期呼叫中的物件。When overriding Dispose(Boolean), be careful not to reference objects that have been previously disposed in an earlier call to Dispose. 如需如何實作 dispose （boolean） 的詳細資訊，請參閱[實作 Dispose 方法](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)。For more information about how to implement Dispose(Boolean), see [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md). 更多關於 Dispose 和完成的詳細資訊，請參閱[清除 Unmanaged 資源向上](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)並[覆寫 Finalize 方法](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/ddae83kx(v%3dvs.100))。For more information about Dispose and Finalize, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) and [Overriding the Finalize Method](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/ddae83kx(v%3dvs.100)).

span.span: Converts the specified region of the input byte array from base 64 and copies the result to the specified region of the output byte array.
The number of bytes written.
